channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 15:08 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 15:08 Countering the threat of artillery fire in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 15:04 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🔴 15:04 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further reports. #Донецка_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 14:55 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now in Chervonogrigorivska territorial community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 14:55 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now in Chervonogrigorivska territorial community. Take shelter! #Червоногригоривська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 14:45 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is currently taking place in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take shelter!

item.title: 🟠 14:09 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 14:09 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291#Купянский_район This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
